mapper.select: SELECT op.`OpenQuestionId`, op.`SourceQuestionId`, op.`SourcePlatform`, op.`QuestionContent`, op.`OriginalQuestionLevel`, op.`CourseId`, op.`OriginalKnowledgePointLabels`, op.`QuestionSource`, op.`OriginalUseRange`, op.`UseRange`, op.`QuestionOnlineTime`, op.`Credibility`, op.`OriginalSecondaryKnowledgePointLabels`, op.`OriginalCapabilityAnalysis`, op.`OriginalSolveMethodLabels`, op.`CreatedOn`, op.`ModifiedOn`, op.`LabelUseType`, opr.`ReferenceCount`, opr.`AnswerCount`, opr.`AnswerCorrectRate` FROM `Openquestion` AS op LEFT JOIN `openquestionreference` AS opr ON op.OpenQuestionId = opr.OpenQuestionId WHERE op.OpenQuestionId in (#{ids});
